entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold for the next available agent.
Yeah, yeah, important. I've been on hold for 20 minutes. I want to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Finally! I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a couple of weeks ago and it’s just not working out for me.
I understand. To initiate a return, could you please provide the order number associated with your VeloBand Pulse purchase?
Ugh, hold on… Okay, it's VF7892345.
Thank you. Let me pull up that order. Okay, I see your VeloBand Pulse purchase. Can you tell me why you want to return it?
It's just not what I expected. The heart rate monitor is inaccurate, and the sleep tracking is a joke. I should have just gotten a different smart watch. Honestly, it's junk.

I understand your frustration. At VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. Since your order falls within that time frame, we can definitely process a return for you.
90 days? Really? Okay, great! So how do I get my money back?

I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process a full refund to your original payment method. It should take 7-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement.
Alright, that sounds easy enough. Email me the label. I want this thing gone. I thought this VeloBand Pulse would be the answer, but it's a waste of money.
Certainly. I've just sent the email to the address associated with your account. You should receive it within the next few minutes. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Yeah, there is actually. I saw an ad for another watch that looked better. Can I get a discount on that one since this one stinks?

Let me check what I can do. I am not able to authorize discounts. However, it looks like our system is showing promotional offers when purchasing multiple smart watch accessories. Unfortunately, no discounts apply if you only buy a single watch. Would you like for me to have my manager follow up with you regarding possible discounts for the replacement VeloBand Pulse replacement?

No, forget it. Just send the label. I'm done with VeloFit. You wasted my time and I waited way too long to get on the phone. And now you can't even authorize a simple discount? Pathetic. This whole experience is a joke.

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for any inconvenience. I have sent the return label, as requested, and you should receive it shortly. We truly appreciate your business and hope you might consider VeloFit in the future. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Thank you for calling VeloFit. Have a good day.
